name: The Jockeys
description:
Welcome to the life of horse racing!

Can you guess who will be the champion?  Try your luck!

Select your horse and hope he wins

 Good luck!

How to play (or watch) the races

Use up and down arrows to select your jockey.

Press enter to start

Cheer for your win

 When the race is over, press the R key to start a new race or press ESC to back to menu
